query.sql: /* ( select rownum rnum , sid , status , username , last_call_et , command , machine , osuser , module , action , resource_consumer_group , client_info , client_identifier , type , terminal from gv$session where module like 'APEX%' ) */ with vs as ( --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) select distinct a.inst_id , a.sid||','||a.serial# sid , P.SPID , a.sql_id , b.plan_hash_value plan_hash , SQL_CHILD_NUMBER CHILD# , decode(command, 0,null, 1,'CREATE TABLE', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CREATE CLUSTER', 5,'ALTER CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DROP CLUSTER', 9,'CREATE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALTER INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CREATE SEQUENCE', 14,'ALTER SEQUENCE', 15,'ALTER TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQUENCE', 17,'GRANT OBJECT', 18,'REVOKE OBJECT', 19,'CREATE SYNONYM', 20,'DROP SYNONYM', 21,'CREATE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CREATE PROCEDURE', 25,'ALTER PROCEDURE', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CREATE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CREATE DATABASE', 35,'ALTERER DATABASE', 36,'CREATE ROLLBACK SEG', 37,'ALTER ROLLBACK SEG', 38,'DROP ROLLBACK SEG', 39,'CREATE TABLESPACE', 40,'ALTER TABLESPACE', 41,'DROP TABLESPACE', 42,'ALTER SESSION', 43,'ALTER USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXECUTE', 48,'SET TRANSACTION', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CREATE USER', 52,'CREATE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CREATE SCHEMA', 57,'CREATE CONTROL FILE', 58,'ALTERER TRACING', 59,'CREATE TRIGGER', 60,'ALTER TRIGGER', 61,'DROP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TABLE', 63,'ANALYZE INDEX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUSTER', 65,'CREATE PROFILE', 66,'DROP PROFILE', 67,'ALTER PROFILE', 68,'DROP PROCEDURE', 69,'DROP PROC', 70,'ALTER RESOURCE', 71,'CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW LOG', 72,'ALTER MATERIALIZED VIEW LOG', 73,'DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW LOG', 74,'CREATEATE MATERIALIZED VIEW', 75,'ALTER MATERIALIZED VIEW', 76,'DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW', 79,'ALTERER ROLE', 79,'ALTERER ROLE', 85,'TRUNCATE TABLE', 86,'TRUNCATE CLUST', 88,'ALTER VIEW', 91,'CREATE FUNCTION', 92,'ALTER FUNCTION', 93,'DROP FUNCTION', 94,'CREATE PACKAGE', 95,'ALTER PACKAGE', 96,'DROP PACKAGE', 97,'CREATE PACKAGE BODY', 98,'ALTER PACKAGE BODY', 99,'DROP PACKAGE BODY', 100, 'LOGON', 101, 'LOGOFF', 102, 'LOGOFF BY CLEANUP', 103, 'SESSION REC', 104, 'SYSTEM AUDIT', 105, 'SYSTEM NOAUDIT', 106, 'AUDIT DEFAULT', 107, 'NOAUDIT DEFAULT', 108, 'SYSTEM GRANT', 109, 'SYSTEM REVOKE', 110, 'CREATE PUBLIC SYNONYM', 111, 'DROP PUBLIC SYNONYM', 112, 'CREATE PUBLIC DATABASE LINK', 113, 'DROP PUBLIC DATABASE LINK', 114, 'GRANT ROLE', 115, 'REVOKE ROLE', 116, 'EXECUTE PROCEDURE', 117, 'USER COMMENT', 118, 'ENABLE TRIGGER', 119, 'DISABLE TRIGGER', 120, 'ENABLE ALL TRIGGERS', 121, 'DISABLE ALL TRIGGERS', 122, 'NETWORK ERROR', 123, 'EXECUTE TYPE', 157, 'CREATE DIRECTORY', 158, 'DROP DIRECTORY', 159, 'CREATE LIBRARY', 160, 'CREATE JAVA', 161, 'ALTER JAVA', 162, 'DROP JAVA', 163, 'CREATE OPERATOR', 164, 'CREATE INDEXTYPE', 165, 'DROP INDEXTYPE', 167, 'DROP OPERATOR', 168, 'ASSOCIATE STATISTICS', 169, 'DISASSOCIATE STATISTICS', 170, 'CALL METHOD', 171, 'CREATE SUMMARY', 172, 'ALTER SUMMARY', 173, 'DROP SUMMARY', 174, 'CREATE DIMENSION', 175, 'ALTER DIMENSION', 176, 'DROP DIMENSION', 177, 'CREATE CONTEXT', 178, 'DROP CONTEXT', 179, 'ALTER OUTLINE', 180, 'CREATE OUTLINE', 181, 'DROP OUTLINE', 182, 'UPDATE INDEXES', 183, 'ALTER OPERATOR', to_char(command) ) Command , last_call_et , status , nvl(a.BLOCKING_INSTANCE,'0') || ','|| nvl(a.BLOCKING_SESSION,'0') BLOCKER , SQL_EXEC_START "START_TIME" , case when instr(b.module,'@',1,1) > 0 then substr(b.module, 1, instr(b.module,'@',1,1)-1) when instr(b.module,'.',-1,1) > 0 then substr(b.module, 1, instr(b.module,'.',-1,1)-1) else b.module end module , nvl(b.action, 'N/A') action , resource_consumer_group , case when instr(a.machine, '\') > 0 then substr(a.machine, instr(a.machine, '\')+1) when instr(a.machine, '.') > 0 then substr(a.machine, 1, instr(a.machine, '.')-1) else a.machine end machine , nvl(substr(a.client_info,instr(a.client_info,',',1,3)+1, instr(a.client_info,',',1,4)-(instr(a.client_info,',',1,3)+1)),'N/A') psdomain , nvl(substr(a.client_info,instr(a.client_info,',',1,4)+1, instr(a.client_info,',',1,5)-(instr(a.client_info,',',1,4)+1)),'N/A') process , nvl(substr(a.client_info,1, instr(a.client_info,',',1)-1), 'N/A') emplid --, nvl(substr(a.client_info,instr(a.client_info,',',1,1)+1, instr(a.client_info,',',1,2)-(instr(a.client_info,',',1,1)+1)),'N/A') osuser , a.osuser , nvl(substr(client_info,instr(client_info,',',1,2)+1, instr(client_info,',',1,3)-(instr(client_info,',',1,2)+1)),'N/A') Client , a.wait_class , case when command = 85 then sql_text else ' ' end sql_text from gv$session a , gv$sql b , gv$process p where a.inst_id = b.inst_id AND a.inst_id = p.inst_id AND a.sql_id = b.sql_id AND a.paddr = p.addr AND a.username is not null AND status = 'ACTIVE' AND machine <> 'PSFT-AMAHAJ3-L' AND a.module like 'APEX%' AND --b.module <> 'SQL*Plus' AND a.username not in ( --'APEX_030200' --, 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' --, 'APPQOSSYS' 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' --, 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' --, 'SYS' --, 'SYSMAN' --, 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by START_TIME , inst_id , machine ) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select vs.inst_id , sid , vs.SPID , vs.sql_id , vs.plan_hash , vs.CHILD# , vs.last_call_et , vs.status , vs.BLOCKER , vs.START_TIME --, vs.username , vs.module "Application" , vs.action "Page" --, vs.client_info "Client Info" --, vs.client_identifier "User:SessionID" , case when vs.status = 'ACTIVE' then last_call_et else null end "Seconds In Wait" , vs.Command , vs.machine "Machine" , vs.osuser "OS User" , vs.resource_consumer_group "Resource Consumer Group" from vs order by 1

display.name: Active SQL
display.description: The Current or last SQL for the selected session
display.tooltip: The Current or last SQL for the selected session

query.sql: select replace(q.sql_text,chr(0)) sql_text from gv$session s , gv$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.sid = :SID
select event , p1 , p2 , case when p3 = 0 then null else p3 end p3 from gv$session_wait where sid = :SID
select s.SID , s.status , s.username , s.process , s.LOGON_TIME , s.server , s.type , p.spid , p.TRACEID , s.serial# from gv$session s , gv$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr
select osuser , machine , terminal , CLIENT_INFO , CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from gv$session where sid = :SID

with locks as ( select session_id , lock_type , mode_held , mode_requested , lock_id1 , lock_id2 , blocking_others from sys.dba_lock ) , waiters as ( select w.session_id waiting_session , h.session_id holding_session , w.lock_type lock_type , h.mode_held mode_held , w.mode_requested mode_requested , w.lock_id1 , w.lock_id2 from locks w , locks h where h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' and h.mode_held != 'None' and h.mode_held != 'Null' and w.mode_requested != 'None' and w.lock_type = h.lock_type and w.lock_id1 = h.lock_id1 and w.lock_id2 = h.lock_id2 and (w.session_id = :SID or h.session_id = :SID ) ) , blockers as ( select holding_session waiting_session , to_number(null) holding_session , 'None' lock_type , null mode_held , null mode_requested , null lock_id1 , null lock_id2 from waiters minus select waiting_session waiting_session , to_number(null) holding_session , 'None' lock_type , null mode_held , null mode_requested , null lock_id1 , null lock_id2 from waiters ) , waiters_blockers as ( select waiting_session , holding_session , lock_type , mode_held , mode_requested , lock_id1 , lock_id2 from waiters union all select waiting_session , holding_session , lock_type , mode_held , mode_requested , lock_id1 , lock_id2 from blockers ) , lock_objects as ( select session_id , cnt lock_obj_count , case when cnt = 1 then object_name else null end object_name , object_id , owner , object_type from ( select session_id , count(distinct object_name) cnt , max(object_name) object_name , max(lo.object_id) object_id , max(ao.owner) owner , max(object_type) object_type from gv$locked_object lo , all_objects ao , waiters_blockers wb where lo.object_id = ao.object_id and ( wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id or wb.holding_session = lo.session_id) group by session_id ) ) , wait_block_ses as ( select waiting_session , holding_session , lock_type , mode_held , mode_requested , s.username , s.osuser , s.CLIENT_INFO , s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER , o.object_name , o.owner , o.object_id , module , o.object_type , o.lock_obj_count , decode(s.command, 0,null, 1,'CREATE TABLE', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CREATE CLUSTER', 5,'ALTER CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DROP CLUSTER', 9,'CREATE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALTER INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CREATE SEQUENCE', 14,'ALTER SEQUENCE', 15,'ALTER TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQUENCE', 17,'GRANT OBJECT', 18,'REVOKE OBJECT', 19,'CREATE SYNONYM', 20,'DROP SYNONYM', 21,'CREATE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CREATE PROCEDURE', 25,'ALTER PROCEDURE', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CREATE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CREATE DATABASE', 35,'ALTERER DATABASE', 36,'CREATE ROLLBACK SEG', 37,'ALTER ROLLBACK SEG', 38,'DROP ROLLBACK SEG', 39,'CREATE TABLESPACE', 40,'ALTER TABLESPACE', 41,'DROP TABLESPACE', 42,'ALTER SESSION', 43,'ALTER USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXECUTE', 48,'SET TRANSACTION', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CREATE USER', 52,'CREATE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CREATE SCHEMA', 57,'CREATE CONTROL FILE', 58,'ALTERER TRACING', 59,'CREATE TRIGGER', 60,'ALTER TRIGGER', 61,'DROP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TABLE', 63,'ANALYZE INDEX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUSTER', 65,'CREATE PROFILE', 66,'DROP PROFILE', 67,'ALTER PROFILE', 68,'DROP PROCEDURE', 69,'DROP PROC', 70,'ALTER RESOURCE', 71,'CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW LOG', 72,'ALTER MATERIALIZED VIEW LOG', 73,'DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW LOG', 74,'CREATEATE MATERIALIZED VIEW', 75,'ALTER MATERIALIZED VIEW', 76,'DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW', 79,'ALTERER ROLE', 79,'ALTERER ROLE', 85,'TRUNCATE TABLE', 86,'TRUNCATE CLUST', 88,'ALTER VIEW', 91,'CREATE FUNCTION', 92,'ALTER FUNCTION', 93,'DROP FUNCTION', 94,'CREATE PACKAGE', 95,'ALTER PACKAGE', 96,'DROP PACKAGE', 97,'CREATE PACKAGE BODY', 98,'ALTER PACKAGE BODY', 99,'DROP PACKAGE BODY', 100, 'LOGON', 101, 'LOGOFF', 102, 'LOGOFF BY CLEANUP', 103, 'SESSION REC', 104, 'SYSTEM AUDIT', 105, 'SYSTEM NOAUDIT', 106, 'AUDIT DEFAULT', 107, 'NOAUDIT DEFAULT', 108, 'SYSTEM GRANT', 109, 'SYSTEM REVOKE', 110, 'CREATE PUBLIC SYNONYM', 111, 'DROP PUBLIC SYNONYM', 112, 'CREATE PUBLIC DATABASE LINK', 113, 'DROP PUBLIC DATABASE LINK', 114, 'GRANT ROLE', 115, 'REVOKE ROLE', 116, 'EXECUTE PROCEDURE', 117, 'USER COMMENT', 118, 'ENABLE TRIGGER', 119, 'DISABLE TRIGGER', 120, 'ENABLE ALL TRIGGERS', 121, 'DISABLE ALL TRIGGERS', 122, 'NETWORK ERROR', 123, 'EXECUTE TYPE', 157, 'CREATE DIRECTORY', 158, 'DROP DIRECTORY', 159, 'CREATE LIBRARY', 160, 'CREATE JAVA', 161, 'ALTER JAVA', 162, 'DROP JAVA', 163, 'CREATE OPERATOR', 164, 'CREATE INDEXTYPE', 165, 'DROP INDEXTYPE', 167, 'DROP OPERATOR', 168, 'ASSOCIATE STATISTICS', 169, 'DISASSOCIATE STATISTICS', 170, 'CALL METHOD', 171, 'CREATE SUMMARY', 172, 'ALTER SUMMARY', 173, 'DROP SUMMARY', 174, 'CREATE DIMENSION', 175, 'ALTER DIMENSION', 176, 'DROP DIMENSION', 177, 'CREATE CONTEXT', 178, 'DROP CONTEXT', 179, 'ALTER OUTLINE', 180, 'CREATE OUTLINE', 181, 'DROP OUTLINE', 182, 'UPDATE INDEXES', 183, 'ALTER OPERATOR' to_char(s.command)) command from waiters_blockers wb , gv$session s , lock_objects o where s.sid = wb.waiting_session and o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session ) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select case when holding_session is null then 'Lock' else 'Lock Waiting' end status , waiting_session , username , object_name , object_id , owner , object_type from wait_block_ses start with holding_session is null connect by prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT APEX_APPLICATIONS.WORKSPACE , APEX_APPLICATIONS.APPLICATION_ID , APEX_APPLICATIONS.APPLICATION_NAME , APEX_APPLICATIONS.OWNER , APEX_APPLICATIONS.LAST_UPDATED_BY , APEX_APPLICATIONS.LAST_UPDATED_ON FROM APEX_APPLICATIONS ORDER BY APEX_APPLICATIONS.WORKSPACE , APEX_APPLICATIONS.APPLICATION_ID

display.name: Detailed Page Statistics
display.description: Statistics about MIN/MAX/AVG response times and rows selected.

query.sql: SELECT p.page_name|| '('||l.page_id||')' "Page", count(*) "Visits", MIN(l.ELAPSED_TIME) "Min(e)" , MAX(l.ELAPSED_TIME) "Max(e)" , ROUND(AVG(l.ELAPSED_TIME),2) "Avg(e)", ROUND(AVG(l.ELAPSED_TIME),2)* count(*) "Weighted(e)", 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:0:'||100*(ROUND(AVG(l.ELAPSED_TIME),2)*count(*))/nvl( (select sum(ROUND(AVG(l1.ELAPSED_TIME),2)*count(*)) PCT from apex_workspace_activity_log l1 where l1.APPLICATION_ID = :APPLICATION_ID group by l1.application_id),1) "Performance Factor", MIN(l.rows_queried) "Min(rows)" , MAX(l.rows_queried) "Max(rows)", ROUND(AVG(l.rows_queried), 2) "Avg(rows)" FROM apex_workspace_activity_log l, apex_applications a , apex_application_pages p WHERE (l.APPLICATION_ID = :APPLICATION_ID ) AND a.application_id = l.APPLICATION_ID AND p.application_id = a.application_id AND p.page_id = l.PAGE_ID GROUP BY a.application_name || '('||l.APPLICATION_ID||')', p.page_name|| '('||l.PAGE_ID||')' order by 6 desc

SELECT a.application_name || '('||l.application_id||')' "Application", p.page_name|| '('||l.page_id||')' "Page", ROUND(AVG(l.ELAPSED_TIME),2) "Avg(e)" FROM APEX_WORKSPACE_ACTIVITY_LOG l, apex_applications a , apex_application_pages p WHERE l.APPLICATION_ID = :APPLICATION_ID AND a.application_id = l.APPLICATION_ID AND p.application_id = a.application_id AND p.page_id = l.PAGE_ID GROUP BY a.application_name || '('||l.APPLICATION_ID||')', p.page_name|| '('||l.PAGE_ID||')' ORDER BY 1, 3 desc

SELECT a.application_name || '('||l.application_id||')' "Application", p.page_name|| '('||l.page_id||')' "Page", count(*) "Page Views" FROM APEX_WORKSPACE_ACTIVITY_LOG l, apex_applications a , apex_application_pages p WHERE l.APPLICATION_ID = :APPLICATION_ID AND a.application_id = l.APPLICATION_ID AND p.application_id = a.application_id AND p.page_id = l.PAGE_ID GROUP BY a.application_name || '('||l.APPLICATION_ID||')', p.page_name|| '('||l.PAGE_ID||')' ORDER BY 1,3 desc
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select WORKSPACE , APPLICATION_ID , application_name , owner , pages , LAST_UPDATED_ON last_updated , VERSION , AUTHENTICATION_SCHEME , theme_number from apex_applications order by WORKSPACE, application_id
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select page_id , nvl(PAGE_title,page_name) page_title , regions , items , buttons , computations , validations , processes , branches , last_updated_on last_updated from apex_application_pages P where P.APPLICATION_ID = :APPLICATION_ID order by page_id
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select page_function , application_id , count(*) page_count from apex_application_pages where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID group by application_id , page_function order by page_function
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select LIST_OF_VALUES_NAME , LOV_TYPE , LIST_OF_VALUES_QUERY , LOV_ENTRIES from APEX_APPLICATION_LOVS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by LIST_OF_VALUES_NAME , LOV_TYPE
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select list_name , template , list_entries from APEX_APPLICATION_LISTS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by list_name , template
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select theme_number , template_type , template_name , is_default from APEX_APPLICATION_TEMPLATES where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by theme_number , template_type
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select theme_number , theme_name from APEX_APPLICATION_THEMES where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by theme_number , theme_name
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select authentication_scheme_name from APEX_APPLICATION_AUTH where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by authentication_scheme_name
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select display_sequence , tab_set , tab_name name , tab_Label label , tab_page , tab_also_current_for_pages , parent_tabset from APEX_APPLICATION_TABS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by display_sequence , tab_set
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select display_sequence , tab_set , tab_name , tab_label , tab_target from APEX_APPLICATION_PARENT_TABS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by display_sequence , tab_set
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select tree_name , tree_type , tree_query , flow_item item_name from APEX_APPLICATION_TREES where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by tree_name , tree_type
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select display_sequence , icon_image , icon_subtext text , icon_target target from APEX_APPLICATION_NAV_BAR where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by display_sequence , icon_image
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select shortcut_name , shortcut_type , shortcut from APEX_APPLICATION_SHORTCUTS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by shortcut_name , shortcut_type
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual
select item_name , data_type , session_state_protection , component_comment from APEX_APPLICATION_ITEMS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by item_name , data_type
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select process_sequence , process_point , process_type , process_name , process , error_message from APEX_APPLICATION_PROCESSES where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by process_sequence , process_point
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select computation_sequence seq , computation_item item , computation_point point , computation_type "TYPE" , computation from APEX_APPLICATION_COMPUTATIONS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by computation_sequence , computation_item , computation_point
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select WEB_SERVICE_NAME , URL , ACTION , PROXY_OVERRIDE , SOAP_ENVELOPE , FLOW_ITEMS_COMMA_DELIMITED ITEMS_COMMA_DELIMITED , STYLESHEET from APEX_APPLICATION_WEB_SERVICES where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by WEB_SERVICE_NAME , URL
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select BUILD_OPTION_NAME , build_option_status , status_on_export , component_comment from APEX_APPLICATION_BUILD_OPTIONS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID order by BUILD_OPTION_NAME , build_option_status
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select workspace , application_id , page_id , nvl(PAGE_title,page_name) page_title , page_function , regions , items , buttons , computations , validations , processes , branches , last_updated_on last_updated from apex_application_pages P where ( :APEX_APPLICATION_ID is null or P.APPLICATION_ID = :APEX_APPLICATION_ID ) order by upper(workspace) , application_id , page_id
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select region , display_sequence seq , item_name , label , display_as , item_source , item_default from apex_application_page_items where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID and page_id = :PAGE_ID order by region , display_sequence , item_name
select 'Application Express 3.0.1 or higher required.' upgrade from dual

select display_sequence seq , region_name , template , source_type , region_source from APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_REGIONS where application_id = :APPLICATION_ID and page_id = :PAGE_ID order by display_sequence , region_name

ACCESS_PREDICATES , FILTER_PREDICATES , PROJECTION FROM gv$sql_plan sp, ( SELECT inst_id , sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value , COUNT(*) entries FROM gv$active_session_history WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND SQL_CHILD_NUMBER = :CHILD# AND INST_ID = :INST_ID AND ( sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE) IN ( SELECT sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE FROM gv$active_session_history WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND SQL_CHILD_NUMBER = :CHILD# AND INST_ID = :INST_ID AND rownum = 1 ) GROUP BY inst_id , sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+) = sp.id AND sp.plan_hash_value = :PLAN_HASH AND CHILD_NUMBER = :CHILD# AND sp.inst_id = :INST_ID ORDER BY sp.plan_hash_value , sp.id

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) select day , serial , value from ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24') day , 'Elapsed time(s)' serial , ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.executions_delta,0,1),1) )),2) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND s.begin_interval_time > trunc(sysdate) - 1 GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24') , sql_id union all ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24') day , 'Executions' serial , SUM(sql.executions_delta) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND s.begin_interval_time > trunc(sysdate) - 1 GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24') , sql_id ) ) order by day

' B' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.num_rows >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.num_rows,'FM000') || ' ' END num_rows , CASE WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.sample_size,'FM000') || ' ' END sample_size , tm.INSERTS , tm.UPDATES , tm.DELETES , tm.TRUNCATED , tm.TIMESTAMP , ts.STALE_STATS , t.DEGREE , t.INSTANCES , t.PARTITIONED --, ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED FROM dba_objects o , dba_tab_statistics ts , dba_tables t , dba_tab_modifications tm WHERE 'TABLE ACCESS' ) AND o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.owner = tm.TABLE_OWNER AND o.object_name = tm.table_name AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by o.object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) --- Update: 2016/08/02 --- Using LISTAGG - anlytical function introduced in database 11gR2 inplace of SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(column_name, ', '),2) for Index column_list ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created segment , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , listagg(dic.column_name, ', ') within group(order by di.owner, di.table_name, di.index_name, dic.column_position) as column_list , CASE WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN distinct_keys >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(distinct_keys,'FM000.00') || ' ' END distinct_keys , CASE WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(NUM_ROWS,'FM000.00') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') created , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') LAST_DDL_TIME , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') last_analyzed , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED from dba_ind_columns dic , dba_indexes di , dba_ind_expressions die , dba_objects do WHERE --(dic.table_name like trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) or instr(dic.TABLE_NAME, trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME))) > 0) AND -- do not delete this line even if it is commented --dic.table_name = trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) AND do.object_type = 'INDEX' AND dic.index_name = di.index_name AND dic.index_name = die.index_name(+) AND dic.COLUMN_POSITION = die.COLUMN_POSITION(+) AND dic.index_owner = do.owner AND dic.index_name = do.object_name AND do.object_name IN ( SELECT o.object_name FROM dba_objects o WHERE ( o.object_name ) IN ( SELECT sp.object_name FROM gv$sql_plan sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH AND sp.operation like '%INDEX%' AND sp.object_type IS NOT NULL -- do not delete even if commented. ) ) group by di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , distinct_keys , NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED order by di.table_name , di.index_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) select case when PARTITIONED = 'NO' then 'execute dbms_stats.gather_table_stats('||''''||owner||''''||', '||''''||object_name||''''||', estimate_percent=>dbms_stats.auto_sample_size, degree=>dbms_stats.auto_degree, no_invalidate=>dbms_stats.auto_invalidate, cascade=>dbms_stats.auto_cascade, method_opt=>'||''''||'FOR ALL COLUMNS SIZE SKEWONLY'||''''||');' else 'execute dbms_stats.gather_table_stats('||''''||owner||''''||', '||''''||object_name||''''||', '||''''||partition_name||''''||', granularity=>'||''''||'AUTO'||''''||', estimate_percent=>dbms_stats.auto_sample_size, degree=>dbms_stats.auto_degree, no_invalidate=>dbms_stats.auto_invalidate, cascade=>dbms_stats.auto_cascade, method_opt=>'||''''||'FOR ALL COLUMNS SIZE SKEWONLY'||''''||');' end "Update Statisticss Statement" from ( SELECT o.owner , o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , ts.last_analyzed , ts.num_rows , ts.sample_size , ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED , ts.STALE_STATS , t.DEGREE , t.INSTANCES , t.PARTITIONED , ts.partition_name FROM dba_objects o , dba_tab_statistics ts , dba_tables t WHERE (o.object_id, o.object_name) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM gv$sql_plan sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID and PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH ) AND o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND ( o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) OR o.owner = :OWNER) ) --where STALE_STATS = 'YES' order by object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) SELECT o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , v.text FROM dba_objects o , dba_views v WHERE ( o.object_id , o.object_name) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM gv$sql_plan sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND CHILD_NUMBER = :CHILD# AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH ) AND o.owner = v.owner AND o.object_name = v.view_name AND o.object_type = 'VIEW' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by o.object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) SELECT INST_ID , SID , SERIAL# , SQL_ID , OPNAME , TARGET , SOFAR , TOTALWORK , START_TIME , TRUNC(sl.ELAPSED_SECONDS/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.ELAPSED_SECONDS,60) elapsed , TRUNC(sl.TIME_REMAINING/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.TIME_REMAINING,60) remaining , ROUND(sl.SOFAR/nvl(replace(sl.TOTALWORK*100,0,1),1), 2) progress_pct FROM gv$session_longops sl WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND inst_id = :INST_ID AND sid = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) AND serial# = substr(:SID, instr(:SID, ',')+1) --time_remaining > 0

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) /* SELECT * FROM GV$SESSION_EVENT WHERE SID = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',', 1)-1) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID ORDER BY TIME_WAITED DESC select INST_ID --, SID --, SERIAL# --, WAIT_CLASS_ID --, WAIT_CLASS# , WAIT_CLASS --, TOTAL_WAITS , TIME_WAITED --from GV$SESSION_WAIT from GV$SESSION_WAIT_CLASS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND SID = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',', 1)-1) AND SERIAL# = substr(:SID, instr(:SID, ',', 1)+1) */ select s.inst_id --, s.sid --, s.serial# , s.sid||','||s.serial# sid , se.event , s.WAIT_CLASS , se.total_waits , se.total_timeouts --, se.time_waited , se.average_wait/10 "AVG WAIT (ms)" , se.max_wait --, se.time_waited_micro , CASE WHEN se.time_waited_micro/1000000 is null then ' ' WHEN se.time_waited_micro/1000000 > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(se.time_waited_micro/1000000/3600/24),'FM9990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,60),'FM00')|| 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC(se.time_waited_micro/1000000/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,60),'FM00')|| 's' END time_waited FROM gv$session_event se , gv$session s WHERE s.INST_ID = SE.INST_ID AND s.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND s.sid = se.sid AND s.sid = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) ORDER BY se.time_waited DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(sample_time,'HH24:MI') end_time , event , COUNT(*) sample_count FROM gv$active_session_history WHERE SQL_ID = :SQL_ID AND SESSION_ID||','||SESSION_SERIAL# = :SID AND sample_time > sysdate - 61/(24*60) AND event IS NOT NULL GROUP BY (sample_time,'HH24:MI') , event ORDER BY end_time

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ash.sample_time,'MI'),'hh24:mi') TIME , o.object_name object_name , COUNT(ash.time_waited) sample_count FROM dba_objects o , gv$active_session_history ash WHERE SQL_ID = :SQL_ID AND SESSION_ID||','||SESSION_SERIAL# = :SID AND o.object_id = ash.current_obj# AND ash.sample_time > sysdate - 61/(24*60) AND ash.time_waited IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TRUNC(ash.sample_time,'MI') , o.object_name ORDER BY TRUNC(ash.sample_time,'MI') , o.object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) select 'select * from table(dbms_xplan.display_cursor('||''''||:SQL_ID||''''||','||:CHILD#||'));' from dual union select 'select * from table(dbms_xplan.display_awr('||''''||:SQL_ID||''''||'));' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) select 'execute DBMS_SHARED_POOL.PURGE ('||''''||ADDRESS||','|| HASH_VALUE||''''||','||''''||'C'||''''||');' "FLUSH SQL" from GV$SQLAREA where SQL_ID = :SQL_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) select 'alter system kill session '||''''||:SID||',@'||:INST_ID||''''||' IMMEDIATE;' "Statement" from dual UNION select 'alter system disconnect session '||''''||:SID||',@'||:INST_ID||''''||' POST_TRANSACTION;' "Statement" from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) SELECT LO.INST_ID , LO.SESSION_ID SID , lo.oracle_username , lo.OS_USER_NAME , DO.owner , DO.object_name , DO.object_type --, LO.locked_mode , CASE WHEN LO.locked_mode = 0 THEN 'None' WHEN LO.locked_mode = 1 THEN 'No Lock' WHEN LO.locked_mode = 2 THEN 'Row Share (SS)' WHEN LO.locked_mode = 3 THEN 'Row Exclusive (SX)' WHEN LO.locked_mode = 4 THEN 'Shared Table' WHEN LO.locked_mode = 5 THEN 'Shared Row Exclusive (SSX)' WHEN LO.locked_mode = 6 THEN 'Exclusive' ELSE to_char(LO.locked_mode) END MODE_HELD FROM dba_objects DO , gv$locked_object lo WHERE DO.object_id = lo.object_id AND SESSION_ID = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID /* SELECT s.INST_ID , s.sid||','||s.serial# "SID" , a.object TABLENAME , s.username USERNAME , p.pid PID , p.spid SYSTEM_ID , case when instr(s.module,'@',1,1) > 0 then substr(s.module, 1, instr(s.module,'@',1,1)-1) when instr(s.module,'.',-1,1) > 0 then substr(s.module, 1, instr(s.module,'.',-1,1)-1) else s.module end module , nvl(s.action, 'N/A') action , DECODE(l.type, 'RT','Redo Log Buffer', 'TD','Dictionary', 'TM','DML', 'TS','Temp Segments', 'TX','Transaction', 'UL','User', 'RW','Row Wait', l.type) LOCK_TYPE FROM gv$access a , gv$process p , gv$session s , gv$lock l WHERE s.sid = a.sid AND s.paddr = p.addr AND l.sid = p.pid AND /*s.username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' --, 'SYSMAN' --, 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) AND s.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND s.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND s.SID = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) GROUP BY s.INST_ID , s.sid||','||s.serial# , a.object , s.username , p.pid , l.type , p.spid , s.module , s.action ORDER BY a.object , s.username */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) select EVENT , P1TEXT , P2TEXT , P3TEXT , WAIT_CLASS , TIME_WAITED from GV$ACTIVE_SESSION_HISTORY where inst_id = :INST_ID AND sql_id = :SQL_ID AND SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH AND SQL_CHILD_NUMBER = :CHILD# AND EVENT IS NOT NULL

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) /* -- Do not delete even if commented. Elapsed Time history select day , serial , value from ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') day , 'Elapsed time(s)' serial , ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.executions_delta,0,1),1) )),2) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') , sql_id union all ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') day , 'Executions' serial , SUM(sql.executions_delta) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') , sql_id ) ) order by day desc */
SELECT a.INST_ID , a.sid||','||a.serial# sid , case when instr(a.module,'@',1,1) > 0 then substr(a.module, 1, instr(a.module,'@',1,1)-1) else a.module end module , nvl(a.action, 'N/A') action , case when instr(a.program,'@',1,1) > 0 then substr(a.program, 1, instr(a.program,'@',1,1)-1) else a.program end program --, a.program , CASE WHEN b.value >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.value/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9990.00') || ' GB' WHEN b.value >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.value/(1024*1024),2),'FM9990.00') || ' MB' WHEN b.value >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.value/1024,2),'FM9990.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(b.value,'FM9990.00') || ' ' END memory --, Trunc(b.value/1024) AS memory FROM gv$session a , gv$sesstat b , gv$statname c WHERE a.sid = b.sid AND a.sid = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',',1)-1) AND a.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND a.INST_ID = b.INST_ID AND a.INST_ID = c.INST_ID AND b.statistic# = c.statistic# AND c.name = 'session pga memory' AND a.program IS NOT NULL ORDER BY b.value DESC

select b.sid , a.name , CASE WHEN b.value >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.value/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' G' WHEN b.value >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.value/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN b.value >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.value/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(b.value,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END value --, b.value from gv$statname a , gv$sesstat b where a.STATISTIC# = b.STATISTIC# AND b.inst_id = :INST_ID AND b.sid = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) AND a.name IN ( 'session pga memory' , 'session pga memory max' , 'session uga memory' , 'session uga memory max' , 'session cursor cache count' , 'session cursor cache hits' , 'session stored procedure space' , 'opened cursors current' , 'opened cursors cumulative' ) AND b.value > 0 order by a.name , b.value

SELECT s.INST_ID , s.sid||','||s.serial# AS sid , case when instr(s.module,'@',1,1) > 0 then substr(s.module, 1, instr(s.module,'@',1,1)-1) when instr(s.module,'.',-1,1) > 0 then substr(s.module, 1, instr(s.module,'.',-1,1)-1) else s.module end module , nvl(s.action, 'N/A') action , su.tablespace , ROUND(((su.blocks*p.value)/1024/1024),2)||'M' AS temp_size , s.username --, s.program FROM gv$session s , gv$sort_usage su , gv$parameter p WHERE s.INST_ID = su.INST_ID AND s.INST_ID = p.INST_ID AND s.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND p.name = 'db_block_size' AND s.saddr = su.session_addr AND s.SID = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) ORDER BY su.tablespace , su.blocks

SELECT a.inst_id , b.sid||','||b.serial# sid --, b.serial# , a.type , a.object , b.username --, b.osuser --, b.program FROM gv$access a , gv$session b WHERE a.INST_ID = b.INST_ID AND a.sid = b.sid AND a.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND a.owner = b.username AND a.SID = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) --a.object = :OBJECT ORDER BY a.object

SELECT s.inst_id , s.sid||','||s.serial# "SID" , pa.value || '/' || LOWER(SYS_CONTEXT('userenv','instance_name')) || '_ora_' || p.spid || '.trc' AS trace_file FROM gv$session s , gv$process p , gv$parameter pa WHERE s.inst_id = p.inst_id AND s.inst_id = pa.inst_id AND pa.name = 'user_dump_dest' AND s.paddr = p.addr AND s.audsid = SYS_CONTEXT('USERENV', 'SESSIONID') AND s.inst_id = :INST_ID AND s.sid = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1)

SELECT s.inst_id , s.sid||','||s.serial# SID , username , s.osuser , si.block_gets , si.consistent_gets , si.physical_reads , si.block_changes , si.consistent_changes FROM gv$session s , gv$sess_io si WHERE s.INST_ID = si.INST_ID AND s.sid = si.sid AND s.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND s.sid = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) ORDER BY s.username , s.osuser
select INST_ID , SID , NAME , VALUE , ISDEFAULT , SQL_FEATURE from gv$ses_optimizer_env where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND SID = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) order by ID
select INST_ID , SQL_ID , CHILD_NUMBER CHILD# , NAME , VALUE , ISDEFAULT from gv$sql_optimizer_env where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND SQL_ID = :SQL_ID order by ID

SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME FROM SYS.dba_users WHERE account_status LIKE '%OPEN%' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' --, 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' --, 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ORDER BY username, EXPIRY_DATE, LOCK_DATE
select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME

/* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED select 'GRANT '||GRANTED_ROLE||' to '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then 'WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME order by GRANTED_ROLE */
select 'GRANT '|| listagg(GRANTED_ROLE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) || ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||listagg(GRANTED_ROLE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) || ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME group by GRANTEE , ADMIN_OPTION order by GRANTEE /* select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE */

select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION --, DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_SYS_privs where grantee = :USERNAME
/* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES') */

select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES')
--union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('SYSTEM_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('ROLE_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('OBJECT_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual
select OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by TABLE_NAME order by grantee, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by grantee , privilege

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by TABLE_NAME order by grantee, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where OWNER = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by grantee , privilege

select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' PASSWORD EXPIRE;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' ACCOUNT LOCK;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' IDENTIFIED BY '||:USERNAME||'123;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' ACCOUNT LOCK PASSWORD EXPIRE;' from dual
select TABLESPACE_NAME , USERNAME , BYTES , MAX_BYTES , BLOCKS , MAX_BLOCKS , DROPPED from DBA_TS_QUOTAS where USERNAME = :USERNAME order by TABLESPACE_NAME
select DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('USER', :USERNAME) "DDL" from dual

select case when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' CASCADE CONSTRAINTS PURGE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA CLASS' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA RESOURCE' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA SOURCE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||'"'||OBJECT_NAME||'";' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TYPE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' FORCE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB CLASS' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB_CLASS('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' else 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||';' end "DDL" FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE --object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE and OWNER IN (:USERNAME) and object_type not in ( 'PACKAGE BODY' , 'LOB' --, 'JOB' , 'INDEX' , 'INDEX PARTITION' , 'TABLE PARTITION' , 'TRIGGER' ) order by owner , object_type

select role from dba_roles where role not in ( 'ADM_PARALLEL_EXECUTE_TASK' --, 'APEX_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE' --, 'AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE' --, 'AQ_USER_ROLE' , 'AUTHENTICATEDUSER' , 'CONNECT' , 'CSW_USR_ROLE' , 'CTXAPP' , 'CWM_USER' , 'DATAPUMP_EXP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'DATAPUMP_IMP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'DBA' , 'DBFS_ROLE' , 'DELETE_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'EJBCLIENT' , 'EXECUTE_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'EXP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'GATHER_SYSTEM_STATISTICS' , 'GLOBAL_AQ_USER_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_EXECUTE_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_SELECT_ROLE' , 'IMP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'JAVADEBUGPRIV' , 'JAVAIDPRIV' , 'JAVASYSPRIV' , 'JAVAUSERPRIV' , 'JAVA_ADMIN' , 'JAVA_DEPLOY' , 'JMXSERVER' , 'LOGSTDBY_ADMINISTRATOR' , 'MGMT_USER' , 'OEM_ADVISOR' , 'OEM_MONITOR' , 'OLAP_DBA' , 'OLAP_USER' , 'OLAP_XS_ADMIN' , 'ORDADMIN' , 'OWB$CLIENT' , 'OWB_DESIGNCENTER_VIEW' , 'OWB_USER' , 'RECOVERY_CATALOG_OWNER' , 'RESOURCE' , 'SCHEDULER_ADMIN' , 'SELECT_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'SPATIAL_CSW_ADMIN' , 'SPATIAL_WFS_ADMIN' , 'WFS_USR_ROLE' , 'WM_ADMIN_ROLE' , 'XDBADMIN' , 'XDB_SET_INVOKER' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES_OVER_HTTP' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES_WITH_PUBLIC' ) order by role
select GRANTEE Username , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_role_privs where GRANTED_ROLE = :ROLE
select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :ROLE union select ROLE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION from role_role_privs where ROLE = :ROLE order by GRANTED_ROLE

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2) ||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "GRANTS" , 'REVOKE '||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2) ||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION' else '' end GRANTED_ROLE , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by GRANTEE, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where grantee = :ROLE ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE
select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE = :ROLE union select ROLE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION from role_sys_privs where ROLE = :ROLE order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE

/* select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' from ( select grantee , privilege|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION' else '' end privilege , count(*) over (partition by grantee) cnt , row_number () over (partition by grantee order by grantee, privilege) seq from dba_sys_privs where grantee = :ROLE ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior grantee = grantee order by grantee , privilege */ select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ','),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYS PRIVILEGES" --, 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) seq from dba_sys_privs where grantee = :ROLE ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE

select GRANTEE , SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) "PRIVILEGES" , OWNER , TABLE_NAME from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by TABLE_NAME order by grantee, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :ROLE order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by GRANTEE , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE

select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS", 'REVOKE'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by TABLE_NAME order by grantee, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :ROLE order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by GRANTEE , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE
select TABLESPACE_NAME , USERNAME , BYTES , MAX_BYTES , BLOCKS , MAX_BLOCKS , DROPPED from DBA_TS_QUOTAS where USERNAME = :ROLE order by TABLESPACE_NAME
select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('ROLE', :ROLE, '') "DDL" from dual

select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" --, 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where grantee in ( select role from dba_roles where role not in ( 'ADM_PARALLEL_EXECUTE_TASK' , 'APEX_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE' , 'AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE' , 'AQ_USER_ROLE' , 'AUTHENTICATEDUSER' , 'CONNECT' , 'CSW_USR_ROLE' , 'CTXAPP' , 'CWM_USER' , 'DATAPUMP_EXP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'DATAPUMP_IMP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'DBA' , 'DBFS_ROLE' , 'DELETE_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'EJBCLIENT' , 'EXECUTE_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'EXP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'GATHER_SYSTEM_STATISTICS' , 'GLOBAL_AQ_USER_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_EXECUTE_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_SELECT_ROLE' , 'IMP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'JAVADEBUGPRIV' , 'JAVAIDPRIV' , 'JAVASYSPRIV' , 'JAVAUSERPRIV' , 'JAVA_ADMIN' , 'JAVA_DEPLOY' , 'JMXSERVER' , 'LOGSTDBY_ADMINISTRATOR' , 'MGMT_USER' , 'OEM_ADVISOR' , 'OEM_MONITOR' , 'OLAP_DBA' , 'OLAP_USER' , 'OLAP_XS_ADMIN' , 'ORDADMIN' , 'OWB$CLIENT' , 'OWB_DESIGNCENTER_VIEW' , 'OWB_USER' , 'RECOVERY_CATALOG_OWNER' , 'RESOURCE' , 'SCHEDULER_ADMIN' , 'SELECT_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'SPATIAL_CSW_ADMIN' , 'SPATIAL_WFS_ADMIN' , 'WFS_USR_ROLE' , 'WM_ADMIN_ROLE' , 'XDBADMIN' , 'XDB_SET_INVOKER' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES_OVER_HTTP' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES_WITH_PUBLIC' ) ) ORDER BY grantee ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ','),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYS PRIVILEGES" --, 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) seq from dba_sys_privs where grantee in ( select role from dba_roles where role not in ( 'ADM_PARALLEL_EXECUTE_TASK' , 'APEX_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE' , 'AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE' , 'AQ_USER_ROLE' , 'AUTHENTICATEDUSER' , 'CONNECT' , 'CSW_USR_ROLE' , 'CTXAPP' , 'CWM_USER' , 'DATAPUMP_EXP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'DATAPUMP_IMP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'DBA' , 'DBFS_ROLE' , 'DELETE_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'EJBCLIENT' , 'EXECUTE_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'EXP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'GATHER_SYSTEM_STATISTICS' , 'GLOBAL_AQ_USER_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_EXECUTE_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_ROLE' , 'HS_ADMIN_SELECT_ROLE' , 'IMP_FULL_DATABASE' , 'JAVADEBUGPRIV' , 'JAVAIDPRIV' , 'JAVASYSPRIV' , 'JAVAUSERPRIV' , 'JAVA_ADMIN' , 'JAVA_DEPLOY' , 'JMXSERVER' , 'LOGSTDBY_ADMINISTRATOR' , 'MGMT_USER' , 'OEM_ADVISOR' , 'OEM_MONITOR' , 'OLAP_DBA' , 'OLAP_USER' , 'OLAP_XS_ADMIN' , 'ORDADMIN' , 'OWB$CLIENT' , 'OWB_DESIGNCENTER_VIEW' , 'OWB_USER' , 'RECOVERY_CATALOG_OWNER' , 'RESOURCE' , 'SCHEDULER_ADMIN' , 'SELECT_CATALOG_ROLE' , 'SPATIAL_CSW_ADMIN' , 'SPATIAL_WFS_ADMIN' , 'WFS_USR_ROLE' , 'WM_ADMIN_ROLE' , 'XDBADMIN' , 'XDB_SET_INVOKER' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES_OVER_HTTP' , 'XDB_WEBSERVICES_WITH_PUBLIC' ) ) ORDER BY grantee ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE
select PROFILE , RESOURCE_NAME , RESOURCE_TYPE , LIMIT from dba_profiles order by PROFILE

select USERNAME , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , CREATED , PROFILE from dba_users where PROFILE = :PROFILE order by ACCOUNT_STATUS , USERNAME , EXPIRY_DATE , LOCK_DATE
select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('PROFILE', :PROFILE, '') "DDL" FROM DUAL

SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME FROM SYS.dba_users WHERE account_status LIKE 'LOCKED%' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' --, 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' --, 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ORDER BY username , EXPIRY_DATE , LOCK_DATE
select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME

/* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED select 'GRANT '||GRANTED_ROLE||' to '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then 'WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME order by GRANTED_ROLE */
select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION --, DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_SYS_privs where grantee = :USERNAME
/* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES') */

select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES')

select OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by TABLE_NAME order by grantee, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by grantee , privilege

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by TABLE_NAME order by grantee, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where OWNER = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by grantee , privilege

select DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('USER', :USERNAME) "DDL" from dual

select case when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' CASCADE CONSTRAINTS PURGE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA CLASS' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA RESOURCE' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA SOURCE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||'"'||OBJECT_NAME||'";' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TYPE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' FORCE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB CLASS' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB_CLASS('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' else 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||';' end "DDL" FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE --object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE and OWNER IN (:USERNAME) and object_type not in ( 'PACKAGE BODY' , 'LOB' --, 'JOB' ,'INDEX' , 'INDEX PARTITION' , 'TABLE PARTITION' ,'TRIGGER' ) order by owner , object_type

SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME FROM SYS.dba_users /* WHERE account_status LIKE 'EXPIRED%' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) */ ORDER BY username , EXPIRY_DATE , LOCK_DATE
select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME

/* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED select 'GRANT '||GRANTED_ROLE||' to '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then 'WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME order by GRANTED_ROLE */
select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION --, DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_SYS_privs where grantee = :USERNAME
/* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES') */

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ','),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYS PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) seq from dba_sys_privs where grantee = :USERNAME ORDER BY grantee ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE /* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME --and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES' ) */ --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('SYSTEM_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('ROLE_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('OBJECT_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual
select OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by TABLE_NAME order by grantee, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by grantee , privilege

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by TABLE_NAME order by grantee, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where OWNER = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by grantee , privilege

select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' PASSWORD EXPIRE;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' ACCOUNT LOCK;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' ACCOUNT UNLOCK;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' IDENTIFIED BY PASSWORD;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' ACCOUNT LOCK PASSWORD EXPIRE;' from dual
select TABLESPACE_NAME , USERNAME , BYTES , MAX_BYTES , BLOCKS , MAX_BLOCKS , DROPPED from DBA_TS_QUOTAS where USERNAME = :USERNAME order by TABLESPACE_NAME
select DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('USER', :USERNAME) "DDL" from dual

select 'SELECT DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('||''''||'USER'||''''||', '||''''||USERNAME||''''||') FROM DUAL;' "DDL" from ( SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME FROM SYS.dba_users WHERE account_status = 'OPEN' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ORDER BY username )

select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" --, 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where grantee in ( select username from dba_users where account_status = 'OPEN' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ) ORDER BY grantee ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ','),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYS PRIVILEGES" --, 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) seq from dba_sys_privs where grantee in ( select username from dba_users where account_status = 'OPEN' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ) ORDER BY grantee ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE

select case when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' CASCADE CONSTRAINTS PURGE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA CLASS' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA RESOURCE' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA SOURCE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||'"'||OBJECT_NAME||'";' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TYPE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' FORCE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB CLASS' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB_CLASS('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' else 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||';' end "DDL" FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE --object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE and OWNER IN (:USERNAME) and object_type not in ( 'PACKAGE BODY' , 'LOB' --, 'JOB' , 'INDEX' , 'INDEX PARTITION' , 'TABLE PARTITION' , 'TRIGGER' ) order by owner , object_type

with tabseg as ( select s.owner , s.SEGMENT_TYPE , s.SEGMENT_NAME --, t.TABLE_NAME , t.logging , s.tablespace_name , t.LAST_ANALYZED , CASE WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' T' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' B' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' M' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM9000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.NUM_ROWS,'FM9000') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , CASE WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' T' WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' B' WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' M' WHEN t.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/1000,2),'FM9000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.sample_size,'FM9000') || ' ' END SAMPLE_SIZE --, t.AVG_ROW_LEN , CASE WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , t.blocks "BLOCKS USED" , s.EXTENTS , CASE WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN s.BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(s.BYTES,'FM9000') || ' ' END BYTES --, s.blocks "BLOCKS ALLOCATED" --, t.empty_blocks "BLOCKS EMPTY" --, (s.blocks-t.empty_blocks-1) "HIGH WATER MARK" from dba_tables t , dba_segments s where s.owner = t.owner and s.owner = :USERNAME and s.segment_name = t.table_name and s.tablespace_name = t.tablespace_name ) , idxseg as ( select s.owner , s.SEGMENT_TYPE , s.SEGMENT_NAME --, i.TABLE_NAME --, i.INDEX_NAME --, i.STATUS , i.LOGGING --, i.LEAF_BLOCKS --, i.BLEVEL , s.tablespace_name , i.LAST_ANALYZED , CASE WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' T' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' B' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' M' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM999.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.NUM_ROWS,'FM999') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , CASE WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' T' WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' B' WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' M' WHEN i.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/1000,2),'FM999.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.sample_size,'FM999') || ' ' END SAMPLE_SIZE -- , i.AVG_ROW_LEN , CASE WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9990') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9990') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , s.BLOCKS , s.EXTENTS , CASE WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' PB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN s.BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(s.BYTES,'FM9990') || ' ' END BYTES from dba_indexes i , dba_segments s where s.owner = i.owner AND s.owner = :USERNAME AND s.segment_name = i.index_name AND s.tablespace_name = i.tablespace_name AND s.segment_type = 'INDEX' )
